fields_of_interest: Budget, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: European Defence Action Plan, Research Initiatives, Space, AI, cybersecurity, Borders Protection, Common Security and Defence Policy, PESCO, Transatlantic Relations
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: HENSOLDT is a global pioneer of technology and innovation in the area of defence and security electronics. The company is a market leader in civilian and military sensor solutions, developing new products to counter evolving threats based on disruptive concepts in such fields as big data, robotics and cyber security. Headquartered in Germany, and with industrial sites across Europe, HENSOLDT employs more than 4000 people.
